Package org.sontana.components

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.components.Position
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CursorPosition
    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
    The Position class represents a point in 2D space.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon

        public static Position lerp​(Position start,
                            Position end,
                            float ratio)
        Linearly interpolates between start and end by ratio.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting Position at interpolate ratio 0.
        end - the ending Position at interpolate ratio 1.
        ratio - the interpolate ratio between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        a value between start and end.

      • lerpUnclamped

                                     Position end,
                                     float ratio)

        Parameters:
        start - the starting Position at interpolate ratio 0.
        end - the ending Position at interpolate ratio 1.
        ratio - the interpolate ratio.
        Returns:
        a value relative to the distance between start and end.
